title: A thought of ranking system.
body:
My friends and I feel that ranking system should evaluate a play from statistic performance rather than only based on the win/lose result. The statistic could be KDA, CS, objective contribution vision providing critical CC and other figures.

Win/Lose evaluation has a lot of limitations on solo queue. It start from ban pick phase. Player don't have the right to decide ohters pick. Even If it seems not winable, they don't have the right to refuse the game. It feel like force them to traped in the pitfall. But, If the evaluation is based on statistic, the unwise pick player will considering about the evaluating issues rather than pick a certain champion to adapt different scenario. 

As we know that the game core is the competition of intelligence and skills. To win the game, players not only need to qualified proficient skill, but also need strategic view of the game. Experienced player would picture that the situation that helps the team to win. Laning phase, team fight and objective occupation are equal important. Do they have good initiate ability? What about range pressure? The weave clean, the CC, the defense and retreat capability. The people who think more should get more rewards than those don't.
